Articles.Content:
Between installing and uninstalling many mods, my 2HOT Thermometer has lost it's substance. I can place it alright, but not click it again to (re)move it, or to set it up with an action group. That's only in SPH/VAB -- it works fine in flight. Only that I have to find and pick it every time because I can't hook it to AGs.

Anyone seen something like this before?

Edited April 25, 2015 by Laie
Update: I still have no idea which mod has caused this, or if this is a mod issue at all. But it seems as if saving and loading the vessel fixes the issue of unclickable parts.

Are you running Ven's Stock Revamp? VSR uses TextureReplacer's reflective shader on some parts including the thermometer; currently there's a bug that renders parts with the shader unclickable until the craft is saved and reloaded. The reason it works in flight is because the game's gone through a scene change.
